item.title: some packages cannot be resolved in eclipse with gradle projects
item.description: In the past two days, I always got the errors "packages cannot be resolved" in eclipse with gradle projects. Initial I encountered the issue, I desperately wanted to resolved the issue. I tried several ways to do that by using solutions from web, however I didnâ€™t get my issue resolved. Due to time constraint, I went back to the old mvn way to do the project. Today I have sometime to revisit the issue now.
